about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered if you could smooch the knights of the Round Table? Well, with Camelot Crush, now you can!

PREMISE

You have just been knighted as a member of the presitigous round table. The very same day, King Arthur announces that there will be a Ball for the upcoming holiday of Beltane. With all the swirling emotions around the kingdom, will you secure a date to this ball? Or will you choose to go alone?

FEATURING

  • 6 Romanceable Members of the Round Table!
  • Expressive Character Art and beautiful CGs (From our lovely Art Director)!
  • Over 15+ beautiful backgrounds made by our BG team!
  • A Wonderful Soundtrack made with care from our composers!
  • A Customizable Main Character (You can choose your name and pronouns!)
  • Over 200+ pages worth of dialogue! We're putting the novel in visual novel!
  • 8 Different Endings!!

**Camelot Crush is currently in active development, with an expected release date of around September 30th! A demo containing the first day will be releasing sometime soon!

Join our growing community on discord at the link in our store's page for art contests, interacting with the dev team, and much more!

content_descriptors.notes: implied alcohol use, mild profanity, innuedos, crude humor

name: Camelot Crush: A Round Table Dating Sim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years

short_description: Court the Various Members of the Round Table in this Exciting Dating Sim
